sentences: Igal aastal saadetakse meilt rahvusvahelistele enampakkumistele tuhandeid karusnahku.
Kogu müük tõi sisse tuhandeid eurot.
context: The word 'tuhandeid' is the partitive plural form of 'tuhat' (thousand) in Estonian. It means 'thousands of' and is used to indicate an unspecified but large quantity of something. In the example sentence, it refers to thousands of furs being sent to international auctions annually.
